abstract: Defender DeAndre Yedlin played two seasons with his hometown team Seattle Sounders before moving to England to join Tottenham Hotspur; is working hard to meet standards of European soccer leagues.
lead_paragraph: DeAndre Yedlin, a young defender who was a breakout star of the World Cup for the United States, is hoping this year at Tottenham Hotspur will be transformative.
snippet: DeAndre Yedlin, a young defender who was a breakout star of the World Cup for the United States, is hoping this year at Tottenham Hotspur will be transformative.

keywords.value: United States Men's National Soccer Team

headline.main: His Heart and a Coach’s Advice Take a World Cup Star Abroad
headline.seo: DeAndre Yedlin, by Joining Tottenham Hotspur, Swims Against Tide on U.S. Team
headline.print_headline: His Heart and Coach’s Advice Take World Cup Star Abroad
